items.title: Google and Apple are collaborating on making switching between their ecosystems easier
items.summary: According to a new report, Google and Apple are collaborating on making switching between their respective mobile operating systems easier than ever before. The first fruit of this labor is to be found in the latest Android Canary build, which went live today. This is intended for developers only, â€¦

items.title: Realme 16 Pro series launch date leaks
items.summary: The Realme 16 Pro recently surfaced online showcasing its key specs and design. Now, a tipster has revealed the lineupâ€™s India launch date. According to the leakster, the Realme 16 Pro series will make its debut in India on January 6. The lineup will consist of the standard 16 Pro and the 16 Pro+. â€¦

items.title: Moto G Stylus (2026) leaks for real this time, Edge 70 Ultra to support a stylus too
items.summary: The Moto G Stylus (2026) allegedly leaked back in November, but now it turns out that was wrong, and the phone shown was instead the Moto G Power (2026). So today the first image showing the real Moto G Stylus (2026) has been leaked. The phone looks like every other recent Motorola smartphone, whicâ€¦

items.title: Joey Barton gets suspended sentence over X posts
items.summary: The ex-footballer sent "grossly offensive" posts about Jeremy Vine, Lucy Ward and Eni Aluko, a court hears.

items.title: Amazfit Active Max leaks with large 576mAh battery
items.summary: Amazfit, known for its well-built but affordable smartwatches, has a new model in the works. The Amazfit Active Max has a clean look with a graduated bezel of the Active series paired with a larger display and a much larger battery. The Max has a 576mAh battery, according to the leaked specs sharedâ€¦

items.title: Are Man Utd turning the tide or is a 'bad result just around corner'?

items.title: Video shows how Google's version of NameDrop for Android will work
items.summary: Back in November we first heard that Google was working on creating something very similar to Apple's NameDrop, but for Android devices. NameDrop was launched in 2023 and lets you share files with another iPhone owner by simply bringing your iPhones close together. NameDrop also supports sharing coâ€¦

items.title: OnePlus Pad Go 2 will get a 10,050mAh battery, more specs revealed
items.summary: OnePlus has revealed more specs of its upcoming Pad Go 2 tablet, which will be unveiled alongside the OnePlus 15R and the Watch Lite on December 17. The OnePlus Pad Go 2 will offer a 12.1-inch display with up to 900 nits in high-brightness mode, 7:5 aspect ratio, 88.5% screen-to-body ratio, and a râ€¦

items.title: IFA aims to have National Training Centre ready for 2028
items.summary: The Irish Football Association says it is hopeful of submitting planning permission for its new National Training Centre next month.

items.title: Intel Arc B370 Xe3 iGPU appears on Furmark 2 â€” Panther Lake graphics fall 14% behind last-gen Xe2 Arc 140V
